message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $11500 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my costs down. Would it be possible to negotiate the price to $10000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $10750 for the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we can reach a fair agreement. Would it be possible to lower the price to $10250?
I'm glad you're open to negotiation, Bob. Considering your offer, I propose a price of $10500 for the product.
Hello Alice, I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further. I think we can come to an agreement. Would you consider a price of $10300 for the product?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Based on your latest offer, I propose a final price of $10400 for the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet my needs. I believe we can come to a mutual agreement. Would you consider a price of $10350 for the product?
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. Considering your offer, I propose a price of $10450 for the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I think we can finalize this at a price of $10400 for the product.
